definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be willing, consent (cf. As. abîtu, command, Dl:W, Eth. 0’abaya refuse, Ar. 0’abay, id., Nejd be willing So:De Jes 3, p. 26; LCB 1880, 817)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: (c. [[לאׁ]], [[אַל]] exc. Is 1:19, Job 39:9; in Hex. rare & only JED, incl. Le 26:21); Pf. [[אָבָה]] Ex 10:27 + [[אָבוּ]] Ju Jdg 19:25 + 7 t.; [[אָבוּא]] Is 28:l2 (Sta:§ 31 R. 2; Kö:1, 414); Impf. [[יׁאבֶה]] De 29:19 + 2 t.; 2 ms. juss. [[תּׂבֵא]] Pr 1:10 (Sta:§ 143 e 1 fin; Kö:1, 576 f) etc.; Pt. [[אׂבִים]] Ez Eze 3:7; —be willing, sq. Inf. with [[ל]] Ex 10:27 + 29 t.; without [[ל]] De 2:30 + 8 t.; subj. ´[[י]] De 10:10, De 23:6, De 29:19, Jos 24:10, 2Ki 8:19, 2Ki 13:23, 2Ki 24:4, 2Ch 21:7; human subj. Ge 24:5, Ge 24:8, Ju Jdg 19:10, 2Sa 2:21, 2Sa 13:25, 2Sa 14:29, 2Sa 14:29, 2Sa 23:16, 2Sa 23:17 = 1Ch 11:18, 1Ch 11:19, 1Ch 19:19; in bad sense Ex 10:27, De 2:30, De 25:7, Ju. Jdg 19:25, Jdg 20:13, 2Sa 13:14, 2Sa 13:16; esp. of perverse Isr. Le 26:21, De 1:26, 1Sa 15:9, Is 28:12, Is 30:9, Is 42:24, Ez Eze 3:7, Eze 3:7, Eze 20:8; subj. animal, [[רֵים]] Job 39:9; abs. (no Inf.) 2Sa 12:17, 1Ki 20:8, 1Ki 22:50; cf. Pr 6:35, of jealous man; bad sense Ju Jdg 11:17, Is 30:15; good sense 1Sa 22:17, 1Sa 26:23, 1Sa 31:4 = 1Ch 10:4, 2Sa 6:10, Pr 1:10; + vb. fin. Is 1:19 ([[אִם תּאׁבוּ וּשְׁמַעְתֶּם]]); consent, yield to, sq. [[לוֹ]] De 13:9 (good sense); sq. [[לִי]] Ps 81:12; sq. [[לַעֲחָתִי]] Pr 1:30; sq. acc. [[תּוֹכַחְתִּי]] v:Pr 1:25 (all in bad sense).
